text: Zhu Chengliang 朱成梁 is a prizewinning Chinese author and illustrator of children's books, often using traditional Chinese painting styles."Zhu Chengliang: Illustrator – China", Bookbird: A Journal of International Children's Literature, Vol.54, No.2 (2016), p. 20.http://www.ibby.org/1202.0.html?&tx;_ttnews%5Btt_news%5D=162&cHash;=3797970f3f41a1b77c585694dfbfe303 == Biography == Zhu Chengliang was born in Shanghai in 1948, and spent his childhood in Suzhou. He studied at the Department of Fine Art, Nanjing University, and has worked as an author, illustrator, editor and designer. He is currently Deputy Chief Editor of the Jiangsu Fine Arts Publishing House.http://www.goodreads.com/author/show/4907456.Zhu_Cheng_Liang == Awards and honours == * Grandpa's Tinderbox was nominated for the IBBY Honour List 2014"Zhu Chengliang: Illustrator – China", Bookbird: A Journal of International Children's Literature, Vol.54, No.2 (2016), p. 20. * A New Year's Reunion (Chinese edition) won first prize in the Feng Zikai Children's Book Award 2010http://fengzikaibookaward.org/en/winners/zhu-chengliang/ * A New Year's Reunion (English translation) was listed as one of the 2011 Ten Best Illustrated Books by the New York Timeshttps://www.nytimes.com/slideshow/2011/11/09/books/bkr-illo- ss-19.html?_r=0 * The Sparkling Rabbit-Shaped Lamp was a Runner Up in the 4th UNESCO Noma Concours for Picture Book Illustrations (1984)http://www.accu.or.jp/noma/english/map/e_index.html == Works == * All in a Day (author: Mitsumasa Anno), 1986 * The Story of the Kitchen God, 1988 * Flame (author: Xi Dun= ET Seton), 2007 * A New Year's Reunion (author: Yu Li- qiong), 2008 * Grandpa's Tinderbox, 2013 * December Porridge == References == == External links == * Zhu Chengliang on Goodreads Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese children's literature Category:Chinese children's book illustrators Category:Chinese children's writers Category:Nanjing University alumni
